text: The Shine Girl is a lost 1916 American silent film drama directed by William Parke and starring Gladys Hulette. It was produced by the Thanhouser Company and was distributed by Pathé Exchange. ==Cast== *Gladys Hulette as The shine girl *Wayne Arey as Judge Clayton *Kathryn Adams as Margaret Kenyon *Ethelmary Oakland as Baby Kenyon *John Cook as John Kenyon *Blanche Davenport ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1916 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:Lost American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1916 drama films
title: The Shine Girl
